Package com.algolia.instantsearch.helpers

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SearchProgressController.ProgressListener
    A listener that will be informed of ongoing progress.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Highlighter
    Renders HTML-like attributed strings into Spannable instances suitable for display.
    InstantSearch
    Uses the Searcher to react to changes in your application's interface, like when your user types a new query or interacts with Widgets.
    Searcher
    Handles the state of the search interface, wrapping an Algolia API Client and provide a level of abstraction over it.
    SearchProgressController
    Watches events and informs its listener when there are one or several ongoing searches.

InstantSearch Android: A library of widgets and helpers to build instant-search applications on Android.
